Address.value: 111 EAST SEGO LILY DRIVE,SUITE 400, SALT LAKE CITY, Utah, 84070, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bridge Investment Group Holdings Inc is a vertically integrated real estate investment manager, diversified across specialized asset classes. The company combines its nationwide operating platform with dedicated teams of investment professionals focused on select U.S. real estate verticals: multifamily, affordable housing, seniors housing, office, development, logistics net lease, logistics properties, debt strategies and agency mortgage-backed securities.
